<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Log out (revoke refresh token)"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/logout"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Revokes the refresh token provided in the body or cookies.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
>
  <Translate id="theme.openapi.request.title">Request</Translate>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"The new Auth resource","content":{"application/ld+json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"refresh_token":{"description":"The refresh token to revoke. If not provided, will look in cookies.","type":["string","null"]}},"title":"Auth"}},"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"refresh_token":{"description":"The refresh token to revoke. If not provided, will look in cookies.","type":["string","null"]}},"title":"Auth"}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"204":{"description":"Logout successful","links":{}},"400":{"description":"Invalid input","links":{}},"422":{"description":"An error occurred","links":{}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
